name: Riley Thompson
persona: Riley Thompson is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who maintains a CGPA just below 3.0. Riley is moderately conscientious and motivated by the desire to achieve better grades, showing a steady level of perseverance even when faced with setbacks. While Riley sometimes struggles with self-discipline and experiences occasional test anxiety, they believe in their ability to succeed academically. Riley is determined to improve their academic standing and is open to adopting new study strategies to reach their goals.
